verses.name: Numbers 26:1
verses.text: And it came to pass after the plague, that the Lord spake unto Moses and unto Eleazar the son of Aaron the priest, saying,

verses.name: Numbers 26:2
verses.text: Take the sum of all the congregation of the children of Israel, from twenty years old and upward, throughout their fathers’ house, all that are able to go to war in Israel.

verses.name: Numbers 26:3
verses.text: And Moses and Eleazar the priest spake with them in the plains of Moab by Jordan near Jericho, saying,
